Bar.ts(1,24): error TS2307: Cannot find module 'Foo' or its corresponding type declarations.


==== Bar.ts (1 errors) ====
    import Error = require('Foo');
                           ~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module 'Foo' or its corresponding type declarations.
    class Bar extends Error {}
    export = Bar;
==== Foo.ts (0 errors) ====
    class Foo {}
    export = Foo;
